Kids working in Hyundai factory in Alabama.
https://bsky.app/profile/morriganmd.bsky.social/post/3lldbhkbles2o
Alabama has been doing this since at least '22. This has been the plan. Rich kids get vouchers. Poor kids do the migrant jobs after the deportations.
https://www.reuters.com/world/us/exclusive-hyundai-subsidiary-has-used-child-labor-alabama-factory-2022-07-22/
